name: Christina's Senior portfolio
body: ### ***About Christina Jian*** My name is Christina Jian. I am 18 year old. I was born in San Francisco, but I feel that I am an immigrant. Because the two months after I was born; my mom took me back to China, and I grew up in China. My father is an outstanding industrial designer. I admire him, so that I think this is the reason why I like to drawing and painting since I was a little. When I was 15 year old, my mom asked me to move back to San Francisco, because she wanted me to have a better education. Currently I am a senior in Burton high school, and I am taking the AoME class. ### **Resume** Christina's Resume ### **Gallery Page** Christina's Portfolio ### **Contact Me** LinkedIn
